website_summaries.verdict: Hikers who are looking for a comfortable boot with an economical price tag will surely appreciate the Montero Mid Waterproof’s list of likable features. Its lightness and supportive insole also added up to its benefits. It, however, received criticisms in relation to its narrow fit and inaccurate sizing. Taking everything into account, the Northside Montero Mid Waterproof is a day hiking boot which can deliver on the trails. Interested buyers, however, should have the patience to try it out first before getting one.
pros: Most online buyers praised the comfortable feel of the Montero Mid Waterproof
The affordability of this day hiking boot was approved by some wearers
A bunch of outdoorsmen commended the style of the Northside Montero Mid Waterproof
A portion of them mentioned that it worked well for work and different outdoor activities
The adequately supportive stock insole satisfied a day hiker
Based on a couple of user reviews, they bought the pair as a gift
They added that the recipients were sold with the boot’s lightness
cons: The restrictive fit of this footgear disappointed a customer
A majority of those who purchased the Montero Mid Waterproof from Northside were dismayed with its small sizing
One had to return the boot twice to get the right length for his foot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hiking boots...comfortable and thoroughly water proof!!
customer_reviews.text: So I just got back from a hiking trip in Ireland and I wanted to try these out there before I reviewed them. I cannot say enough positive things about these boots! Broke them in for about two weeks walking around New York City, Central Park, and on the treadmill at my gym! LOL I hiked for 30 miles over two days at a difficult level...Wanted to kill my friend as my legs were killing me! The boots were fantastic though! Walking through wet grass, rain and a lot of uphill and my feet were very comfortable! Totally water proof with the only wetness from my own sweat They weren’t overly warm though either. Cannot recommend these enough!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: the material pleased. when we buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy this shoe for my husband. his leg is usually 9.5. I order size 10. along the length is normal, even slightly larger, but the width of the leg is narrow. although, my husband has a standard foot. the view is very acceptable. the material pleased. when we buy, absolutely no feedback from this model :( now I just say that it was a ridiculous price! only 17 dollars! Now I'm waiting for winter to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: Ordered first pair 1/2 size larger than normal due to other customer reviews. Received the boots as promised on time put them on "too small". Sent them back with no problems and ordered another pair 1 size bigger than normal. Received my boots on time tried this pair on fit is good. My normal size is 11 and these are 12 but seem to be working for me at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Support for my Old Feet and Legs
customer_reviews.text: I like these hiking boots better than the Wolverines that they are replacing. These have a great insole and I don't expect I will need to add more for additional support. I spent a day standing on a concrete floor and my legs and feet are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Domain@WaggleTech

customer_reviews.title: he said they felt like he was walking barefoot
customer_reviews.text: my husband is hard to buy for when it comes to shoes. these are an instant hit with him! the second he put them on, he said they felt like he was walking barefoot. that was before they were broken in. they are great in the snow, and they seem to provide him with everything he needs for both day to day and work. i would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Sam.Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the money, but run small.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be decent quality but about a half size too small. I was hoping that'd wouldn't be the case. I tried wearing them a couple of days and they were hurting my toes in the left boot. I've never had issues with buying my normal size before.
customer_reviews.author: WALTER WILLIAMSON

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoe however, I wear a 13 in most shoes and these are closer to a size 12. No space between my toes and the end of the shoe. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Audioholic

customer_reviews.title: Strong and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my step father who enjoys hiking boots. He found it very comfortable. It was well priced compared to many other ones that I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, great fit and style, durable (so far). Used for both work and outdoor activities. This is my second pair of Northside shoes. I really enjoy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: VS1979

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit good and I am hard to fit. Shoes are durable. Price is nice.
customer_reviews.author: NCH

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it feel light, and sturdy, but a bit bulky. it more of a construction that Hiking
customer_reviews.author: MY-VU

customer_reviews.title: I am going to try and wear them because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going to try and wear them because it is a hassle to exchange but I always wear a ten, I ordered a 10 1/2, but they are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Decent hiking shoe at this price
customer_reviews.text: This hiking shoe seems very decent for its price. Very comfortable and sole has not worn through yet. Size seems to be about half size smaller than indicated.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: to small
customer_reviews.text: horribly sized seem to be at least one size to small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that very comfortable and lite like a feather
customer_reviews.text: I can still use but I have to wear thin layered socks. Other than that very comfortable and lite like a feather.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: seems like a quality boot but it was too small
customer_reviews.text: seems like a quality boot but it was too small. Usually wear a 12.5 so I thought a 13 would be perfect. Nope, had to return because it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Navigator

customer_reviews.title: These boots were sized wrong. This is his second ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots were sized wrong. This is his second pair at the same size and these are ridiculously small. Unfortunately he stashed them in the closet until winter and we missed the return window..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, just regular everyday cheap shoes. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jareth

customer_reviews.title: It maybe a great pair shoe for the outdoor
customer_reviews.text: It maybe a great pair shoe for the outdoor, but personally, I found too urged and unbendable to the step.
customer_reviews.author: David Debe

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of hiking boots I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many pairs of the more expensive popular brands, but have always been disappointed in how quickly the sole/traction wears down, little traction, uncomfortable, etc. BUT Northside boots have everything I'm looking for at a significantly less price! These boots have excellent traction, the soles last for a very long time, they're comfortable, durable, and more! I love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Backpacker

product_meta.title: Northside Mens Montero MID WP-M Montero Mid Wp
product_meta.description: Low version of our popular mid-cut montero that provides everything you need to get outdoors and enjoy the day. Suede and nylon upper withstand the elements while the toe cap provides extra durability
feature_bullets: Waterproof membrane is seam sealed keep the water out
Long outsole with outdoor traction design for firm footing
